title: Shiratori Reiko de Gozaimasu! (I am THE Shiratori Reiko!)
synopsis: 19-year old Reiko is a rich, arrogant, material girl, who refuses to admit her feelings for classmate Tetsuya Akimoto before it's almost too late. Reiko pursues him to Tokyo and enrolls at his university in an attempt to win him back.
staff: [['Hongou, Mitsuru', ['Director']], ['Yuasa, Masaaki', ['Key Animation']], ['Ebisawa, Kazuo', ['Art Director']], ['Suzuki, Yumiko', ['Original Creator']]]
